name: Ungifted
description:
What you give, comes back to you. This is a short game about gifts, cycles and responsibility.

Created for #bistyjam july 2022, music is royalty free and everything was created by the author.

Thanks for caring.

############## Disclaimer#############

This is my first Bitsy game and post ever on itch.io, I made it in half a day, story included to participate of this Jam. I hope you enjoy it  :) all feedback is welcomed as I'm still getting acquainted with the tools.

You can move with arrow keys.
